result.name: natural-bed-disturbance-modelling-outputs
result.notes:
This dataset consists of output from a computer model that attempts to predict 
annual seabed disturbance caused by waves and currents. Disturbance was taken 
to mean physical movement of the seedbed sediments and was quantified as a 
disturbance frequency (days per year disturbance occurred). For sandy regions 
the disturbance depth is also predicted (days per year disturbance occurred to 
a given depth below the seabed). For gravel and mud substrates the depth of 
disturbance was left unquantified. Format: Zipped ASCII (space delimited) 
files covering the period 2000-2008 inclusive.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Natural bed disturbance modelling outputs
